00069 struct PxDistanceJointFlag
00070 {
00071     enum Enum
00072     {
00073         eMAX_DISTANCE_ENABLED   = 1<<1,
00074         eMIN_DISTANCE_ENABLED   = 1<<2,
00075         eSPRING_ENABLED         = 1<<3
00076     };
00077 };
00078 
00079 typedef PxFlags<PxDistanceJointFlag::Enum, PxU16> PxDistanceJointFlags;
00080 PX_FLAGS_OPERATORS(PxDistanceJointFlag::Enum, PxU16);
00081 
00082 /*
00083 \brief a joint that maintains an upper or lower bound (or both) on the distance between two points on different objects
00084 */
00085 
00086 
00087 class PxDistanceJoint: public PxJoint
00088 {
00089 public:
00090     static const PxJointType::Enum Type = PxJointType::eDISTANCE;
00091 
00105     virtual void                    setMinDistance(PxReal distance)                     = 0;
00106 
00115     virtual PxReal                  getMinDistance()                            const   = 0;
00116 
00117 
00131     virtual void                    setMaxDistance(PxReal distance)                     = 0;
00132 
00141     virtual PxReal                  getMaxDistance()                            const   = 0;
00142 
00143 
00152     virtual void                    setTolerance(PxReal tolerance)                      = 0;
00153 
00154 
00168     virtual PxReal                  getTolerance()                              const   = 0;
00169 
00183     virtual void                    setSpring(PxReal spring)                            = 0;
00184 
00193     virtual PxReal                  getSpring()                                 const   = 0;
00194 
00195 
00209     virtual void                    setDamping(PxReal damping)                          = 0;
00210     
00211 
00220     virtual PxReal                  getDamping()                                    const   = 0;
00221 
00232     virtual void                    setDistanceJointFlags(PxDistanceJointFlags flags) = 0;
00233 
00234 
00244     virtual void                    setDistanceJointFlag(PxDistanceJointFlag::Enum flag, bool value) = 0;
00245 
00254     virtual PxDistanceJointFlags    getDistanceJointFlags(void)                 const   = 0;
00255 
00256     virtual const char*         getConcreteTypeName() const                 {   return "PxDistanceJoint"; }
00257 
00258 protected:
00259     PxDistanceJoint(PxRefResolver& v)   : PxJoint(v)    {}
00260     PxDistanceJoint()                                   {}
00261     virtual bool                isKindOf(const char* name)  const       {   return !strcmp("PxDistanceJoint", name) || PxJoint::isKindOf(name); }
